name: Dots and Boxes
description:
• Choose a color with the pen tool
  • Two (or more) players take turns drawing a line (hint: hold shift to draw a strait line)
  • You “win” a square when you are the one to close it
  • Claim said square with a designated mark of some sort (initial, squiggle, chosen stamp, etc)
  • Person with the most squares at the end wins
